2924.title: popcards
2924.author: Anonymous
2924.description: For those of you not lucky enough to get the real pop-pop trading cards we passed out at MacWorld/NYC, we've made them available here in digital form!   This archive contains large high quality JPEG images of all 7 pop-pop pops!  Enjoy!

2925.title: PopEdit
2925.author: Anonymous
2925.description: This is an UNOFFICIAL editor for pop-pop. It was created by James Dolan, but he stopped hosting it shortly after I downloaded it. May be incompatible with future versions of OS X or pop-pop. Requires: Mac OS X and an ATI Rage 128 or better graphics card. Submitted by Thunderforge. [jinx] This utility is NOT supported by Ambrosia Software. You may post any questions about it on the pop-pop web board, but do not expect an official answer, or help. Please use at your own risk - but it seems to work with the current pop-pop fine.[/jinx]

2923.title: pop-pop unoffical guide
2923.author: Anonymous
2923.description: This guide helps you out on all of the subjects for this game. This reveals every single strategy you need to know. The unoffical guide tells you the 411 about the entire pop-popgame and even tells you the special bricks in this game literally! So read it all right here!  Submitted and written by me, pop-popx.
